items.title: Stock of the Day: Colgate-Palmolive India: Strong Volume Growth Amid Tough Market Conditions
items.description: Colgate continued to lead in the oral-care category, and there is a large headroom for growth, given the lower penetration and high rural salience (40 percent of sales). Although increasing penetration in rural areas remains a key growth driver, it could be an uphill task in the medium term, while the growing personal-care segment presents a significant opportunity. Category development, new communication programmes and expanding rural reach will accelerate growth.

items.title: Brokerage Radar: CLSA backs Swiggy with 'Buy', HSBC downgrades TCS, Tech Mahindra
items.description: Check out the latest brokerage calls and analyst comments on the stocks in action today. Our coverage includes Divi's Labs, Godrej Properties, IT stocks and more.

items.description: Bharat Electronics Share Price | The share price gained nearly 100 percent in the last one-year.

items.title: Metropolis Healthcare shares in focus on acquiring Core Diagnostics
items.description: Metropolis Healthcare Share Price | The share touched a 52-week high of Rs 2,306.85 and a 52-week low of Rs 1,450.05 on 10 October, 2024 and 12 January, 2024, respectively.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a flat start; US markets fall, Asia trades higher
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street's main indexes closed lower on Monday, driven by a drop in AI leader Nvidia that weighed on tech stocks, as investors looked ahead to a crucial inflation report set for later this week. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 240.59 points, or 0.54%, to 44,401.93, the S&P 500 lost 37.42 points, or 0.61%, to 6,052.85 and the Nasdaq Composite 123.08 points, or 0.62%, to 19,736.69.

items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The GIFT Nifty is indicating a flat to positive start for the day.

items.title: Stock Radar: Tata Motors, Syngene, Metropolis, Bharat Electronics, Lupin, Isgec Heavy, Suraksha Diagnostic, GE Vernova in focus on Tuesday
items.description: Stocks like Tiger Logistics India, NHPC, Vodafone Idea, Bharat Forge, RailTel Corporation of India, Lemon Tree Hotels, LGB Forge, Datamatics Global Services, PG Electroplast, Torrent Power, and JSW Steel will also be in focus on December 10.

items.title: Agri Picks Report December 10, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, Farmers in Rajasthan have sown rabi crops over 10.1 million hectares as of Friday, up 4.7% on year from 9.7 million hectares sown in the same period last year, according to a report published by the state agriculture department.

items.title: Rs 1.5 lakh crore: Big names among strong IPO pipeline for 2025
items.description: The strong pipeline comes close on the heels of a robust 2024 when 75 Indian companies raised over Rs 1.5 lakh crore through mainboard IPOs, according to data from Prime Database.

items.title: Citi sees any sharp correction in Divi's Labs shares as a strong buying opportunity
items.description: Analysts at Citi are not too concerned as they believes that even while the passage of the Biosecure Act appears to have been delayed, its thesis remains intact for Divi's Labs.

items.title: Godrej Properties shares rise 2% as Jefferies says 'buy', sees 35% upside
items.description: The pivot to owned land and a recent equity raise is expected to bolster growth and cash flow, Jefferies says.

items.title: Syngene Intl stock jumps 3% after promoter Biocon likely offloads Rs 706 cr worth stake
items.description: The block deal in Syngene will also trigger a 60-day lock-in period before Biocon can execute further stake reduction in the CDMO company, reports suggest.

items.title: Greaves Cotton shares soar 9% as Vijay Kedia buys stake worth Rs 25 crore
items.description: The acquisition of Greaves Cotton by Kedia comes ahead of the proposed listing of its electric vehicle arm.

items.title: Glenmark Pharma surges 4% after first clinical data of blood cancer drug shows positive signs
items.description: Positive clinical trails results strengthen the case for approval of Glenmark Pharma's blood cancer drug. If successful, it could turn into a huge revenue opportunity for the company.

items.title: Tata Motors shares gain as company plans 3% price hike to counter rising input costs and inflation
items.description: Following the upcoming price hike, the base variants of Nexon and Punch could cost up to Rs 8.24 lakh and Rs 6.31 lakh.

items.title: CE Infosystems shares snap 4-day winning streak, slump 6% as profit booking kicks in
items.description: Most of the gains for CE Infosystems were recorded in the previous session, following the company's reversal of its decision to invest in the new consumer-facing business being established by CEO Rohan Verma, son of CMD Rakesh Verma.

items.title: In 2025, capex and SIP flows will lend support, but valuations a worry, says Kotak Securities
items.description: "The next key event, the budget, is anticipated to have a major impact. After the budget, markets can even reach the levels of 28,000 and 29,000," said Kotak Securities.
